results.content: A good introduction and a place to start - musch to do to gain a more complete understanding of the topic.

results.content: Lots of background noise that can be distracting at times. Instructor knows the topic well. Would have liked more information on patterns. The practice test has many questions covering information not covered in the training.

results.content: A lot of the questions did not relate to the course, rather the notes about best practise, would have been useful if this had been made clear.

results.content:
There is too much noise and interruptions in the background far too often, the tone of the instructor seems confusing.
He seems to ramble off, interrupts himself and repeats himself A LOT.
"OK Like" , "OK Guys", "So Basically.." and "Like.." are used too much in this presentation.

response.content: Thank you for your feedback ,I will try to record it again and update the course.
response.content_html: Thank you for your feedback ,I will try to record it again and update the course.
